document.heading: Street and Alley Closing and Acquisition Procedures Act of 1982 Relocation Assistance Amendment Act of 1986

history.narrative: Law 6-133, the “Street and Alley Closing and Acquisition Procedures Act of 1982 Relocation Assistance Amendment Act of 1986,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 6-330, which was referred to the Committee of the Whole. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on May 13, 1986 and May 27, 1986, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on June 6, 1986, it was assigned Act No. 6-171 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review.
